ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I found a small bug (which appears in a lot of places) which only really affects the scenario file that is produced in the conversion process. The only

Hi,
I found a small bug (which appears in a lot of places) which only really
affects the scenario file that is produced in the conversion process.

The only effect I have found is if you open up the resulting scenario files
there are bits of plain text in the garbage areas of strings.  If you look
closer you'll find that it's actually part of the text that was inside the
text file which was used to produce the scenario file :)

As far as I can tell this has no effect on the data in the scenario, the
ability to convert the scenario (either way) or when playing the game with a
scenario produced by it.

I will correct the bug on my drive, but I won't upload it to my website yet.
I will put the corrected version into the yahoo group area or whatever once
it's ready.

Have fun!

- Deathifier
